body_html:
OK, I can reproduce it. It seems some weird interaction between TensorFlow and MKL.
Calling linalg.svd from inside py_func makes subsequent calls to eigh about 10% slower when you use MKL, but no effect in default BLAS

https://github.com/yaroslavvb/stuff/blob/master/github_pyfunc_slowness.py

Not sure why that would happen...perhaps the svd call in MKL ends up changing some defaults used by eigh? cc @vivek-rane since he seems to know about MKL

body:
OK, I can reproduce it. It seems some weird interaction between TensorFlow and MKL.
Calling linalg.svd from inside py_func makes subsequent calls to eigh about 10% slower when you use MKL, but no effect in default BLAS

https://github.com/yaroslavvb/stuff/blob/master/github_pyfunc_slowness.py

Not sure why that would happen...perhaps the svd call in MKL ends up changing some defaults used by eigh? cc @vivek-rane since he seems to know about MKL
